introduction: SYNOPSISJi-woo and Eun-kyo are happily married to other people. Ji-woo works for a newspaper company and Eun-kyo teaches Oriental painting at the local cultural center. It is instant attraction when they first lay eyes on each other. The more they see each other, the deeper they fall for one another. They become oblivious to their respective spouses or of being found out. The only conclusion for them is that they can never be apart. When Eun-kyo's husband sends a letter to Ji-woo's boss about his conduct, Ji-woo resigns and does not look back. He ends his 25-year marriage for Eun-kyo. Eun-kyo also leaves her mother and husband to go to Ji-woo. The doomed couple leave for Jeju Island where the only solution they can arrive at is to end their lives together.故事有男人和女人装饰自己的家园，在栅栏里过日子。30名女孩教东方出版传媒经理是男性和文化中心明确最近我推闲职秒银娇下降到彼此一目了然。随着会议的继续，两人失去了自由裁量权，沉浸在彼此之中。唯一的结论是，即使你知道你的配偶和社会的意识，也没有分离。他们为自己提供空间，并垂涎对方的身体。当恩圭的丈夫辞职到自己的工作，并发出一封信来揭示这段关系时，她辞了职，结婚了25年。恩also也决定离开母亲和丈夫。离开世界去济州岛的两个人一起死了。
